title: Geeks Beyond Time
description: Barbara Twizel gladly exchanges a life of geeky sci-fi fandom for one of danger and intrigue when hired to find missing time-travel theorist Craig Elliot. But by trying to cast her geekiness aside, is she making a terrible mistake? Might geeks actually be destined to rule the world? Or are they just a bunch of weirdos after all?
author: S.R. Thomas
